DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this trial is to determine the effect of different lifestyle interventions such as aerobic exercise and alternative resistance training methods, combined with a hypocaloric diet, on weight, body composition and metabolic risk factors in overweight and obese adults.
DOC.criteria: Body mass index > 24.9 kg/m² age > 18 y premenopauzal Body mass index > 40 kg/m² Pregnancy Diabetes Joint replacement surgery
